translations.translation: And those who restrain by reprimanding,
by those who drive away the devil (to protect Our revelation),
And by oath of those who herd with a stern warning.
By those who drive the clouds in a good way.
Then those who drive away with reproof,
And those who drive away (the wicked) with reproof
and those who drive away [the wicked] with reproof
by the ones who drive [the clouds] vigorously,
And so are strong in repelling (evil),
By those (angels) who drive the clouds in a good way.
[37:2] and the drivers who drive [away], the angels who drive the clouds;
(And those who drive away with reproof) He also swore by the angels who drive away the clouds and bring them together.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ومتى تعقلت إرادته بمقدور من مقدوراته ومراداته المأمورة إياهم وحينئذ زاجرات { فَٱلزَّاجِرَاتِ } المدبرات على الفور لما يأمرهم الحق من التدبيرات المتعلقة بنظام الكائنات غيباً وشهادةً { زَجْراً } [الصافات: 2] أي: تدبيراً تاماً كاملاً، حسب المأمور والمقدور بلا فتور وقصور




وبعدما صدر أمره سبحانه، وجرى قضاءه بقوله:
